name: Rubik's Touchless
description:
Many people around me, including myself, love Rubik’s cubes. Turing a Rubik’s cube might seem to most like an extremely simple act, although, it’s not for people with arm or hand disabilities. According to the Ohio State University, there are approximately 3 million people worldwide who had some sort of arm amputation. Imagine all these people unable to enjoy the fun of turning and solving Rubik's cubes; thank goodness, there's Rubik's Touchless...

Rubik's Touchless is an application programmed in Unity using C# codes, that allows anyone to enjoy the fun of cubing, completely without using their hands by using multiple voice commands to control a virtual Rubik's cube, which is available in 2 modes, including one which is colourblind-friendly. 

With Rubik's Touchless, at least 3 million more people around the world would be able to cube with us together.
